articles.author: Andre Janse Van Vuuren, Henry Ren
articles.title: Asian Stocks to Climb After Rally on Wall Street: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: US equities were set to retreat from record highs while European stocks declined for the first time this week as US President Donald Trump escalated his trade offensive.
articles.content:

articles.author: Francesca Stevens, Josh Wingrove, Nguyen Dieu Tu Uyen
articles.title: Vietnam Surprised by Trump Tariff Announcement, Seeks Lower Rate - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Vietnam’s leadership was caught off guard by US President Donald Trump’s announcement last week that it agreed to a 20% tariff, and the Southeast Asian nation is still seeking to lower the rate, according to people familiar with the matter.
